// --- RULES SCREEN --- Rules of the Balda game Next Done // List of rules Start of the game Balda is a game in which you need to form words using letters located on the playing field.
At the beginning of the game, the initial word is entered in the middle. Add a new letter Players make moves one by one.
During his turn, the player must substitute a letter on the playing field so that it is located in a cell adjacent to already filled cells. Select a new word After placing a letter on the game field, player must compose a word using the added letter.
To do this, the letters of the new word are sequentially marked. Restrictions You can use common nouns in the game.
The word must exist in the game's dictionary.
Words cannot be repeated within the same game. Earning points One point is awarded for each letter of a new word.
The longer the word, the more points the player gets per move. End of the game The game ends when all cells of the playing field are filled.
Or in the case when it is impossible to form the next word according to the specified rules. Determining the winner The game is won by the one who scored the most points at the end of the game.
If there are several players with the most points, a draw is declared.
